channel.title: How to make it so admins cannot trade?
channel.description:
On my server admins can trade any player, how do i make it so they cant? i have a 474/317 server.
Thanks.

item.title: How to make it so admins cannot trade?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Then your adding it incorrectly, because I tested it and it works.
Please post your tradeReq() method.

And if you get 100 errors, then my snippet isnt the reason why. Its something else.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so admins cannot trade?

item.title: How to make it so admins cannot trade?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

In your tradeReq() method in your client class (client.java), add this at the top of the method,

if (other.playerRights != 0 || playerRights != 0) { sM("Staff trading has been disabled!"); trade_reqId = 0; return; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so admins cannot trade?

item.title: How to make it so admins cannot trade?
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Idk what kind of source youâ€™re talking about but this might work

Go into config.java and replace

	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true;

with

	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false;
